SEARCH.NAME: search
SEARCH.NO_ARGUMENTS: You have to type something to make bot a search.

LEAVE.NAME: leave
LEAVE.LIST_HAS_SONGS: There is songs in the queue, try --leave command.

RESUME.NAME: resume
RESUME.QUEUE_EMPTY: Queue is empty, there is no song to play.
RESUME.QUEUE_NOT_STOPPED: Queue was not able to resume beacuse queue was not paused.

LOOP.NAME: loop
LOOP.NO_QUEUE: Bot was not able to loop because there was no queue to loop.

STOP.NAME: stop
STOP.NO_QUEUE: There is no song playing to stop.

SKIP.NAME: skip
SKIP.NO_QUEUE: There is no song in the queue to skip.

SKIPTO.NAME: skipto
SKIPTO.DESCRIPTION: Bot skips to song on given queue number.
SKIPTO.NOT_AN_ITEM: Bot didn't find the given queue number.

SHUTDOWN.NAME: leave
SHUTDOWN.DESCRIPTION: Bot cleans the queue and leaves the channel.
SHUTDOWN.NO_QUEUE: There is no queue to clear.

CONNECT.NAME: join
CONNECT.DESCRIPTION: Bot joins the channel you're in.
CONNECT.YOU_ARE_NOT_CONNECTED: You have to be connected to a voice channel.

PLAYLIST.NAME: playlist
PLAYLIST.DESCRIPTION: Bot adds typed playlist to queue.
PLAYLIST.SAME_CHANNEL: You have to be in the same channel with the bot.
PLAYLIST.NO_ARGUMENTS: You have to type playlist name/URL for bot to add playlist.
PLAYLIST.YOU_ARE_NOT_CONNECTED: You have to be connected to a voice channel.
PLAYLIST.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS_JOIN: Bot hasn't got permission to join.
PLAYLIST.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS_SPEAK: Bot hasn't got permission to speak.

PURGE.NAME: clear
PURGE.SAME_CHANNEL: You have to be in the same channel with the bot to clear queue.

PREFIX.NAME: prefix
PREFIX.NOT_ADMIN: You have to be an **Administrator** to use this command.
PREFIX.NOT_CACHED: This server hasn't got a database history, it'll be created. If you don't want your informations stored, contact with the bot manager.
PREFIX.ERROR_WHILE_CREATING_DATABASE: There has been an error while creating your database.
PREFIX.DEFAULT_IS_SET: There isn't any prefix set for this server. Default is: **--**
PREFIX.FOUND_PREFIX: Bot has found prefix on your database records. Found prefix is: **{PREFIX}**
PREFIX.ERROR_SETTING: There was an error while setting your prefix.
PREFIX.LENGTH_ABOVE: Typed prefix is so long. (Max: 10 Characters)

SHUFFLE.NAME: shuffle
SHUFFLE.NO_QUEUE: List was not able to shuffle because list was empty.

OTHER.COOLDOWN_TEXT: You have to wait {SECONDS} seconds to use this command!
OTHER.ERROR_WHILE_COMMAND: There was an error while running the command, please report: https://ritim.xyz/discord
